channel.title: CVE Feed for Sensormatic Electronics, a subsidiary of Johnson Controls, Inc. -- Illustra Pro Gen 4 Dome
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sensormatic Electronics, a subsidiary of Johnson Controls, Inc. -- Illustra Pro Gen 4 Dome

item.title: CVE-2023-0954|2024-08-02T05:32:46.221Z -- sensormatic%20electronics%2C%20a%20subsidiary%20of%20johnson%20controls%2C%20inc. -- illustra%20pro%20gen%204%20dome
item.description: A debug feature in Sensormatic Electronics Illustra Pro Gen 4 Dome and PTZ cameras allows a user to compromise credentials after a long period of sustained attack.
